Nov. 4, 1916 D Penygroes Contest (Class A)

Siege of Rochelle (arr. Sutton)
Public Hall, Penygroes, Llanelli, Carmarthenshire Prizes - 1st £12 and shield, 2nd £6, 3rd £3. Best cornet - Gwaun-cae-Gurwen, Best euphonium and trombone - Blaengwynfi. 8 bands competed
